entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
